metadata.title: CVE-2017-12149 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: In Jboss Application Server as shipped with Red Hat Enterprise ApplicationPlatform 5.2, it was found that the doFilter method in theReadOnlyAccessFilter of the HTTP Invoker does not restrict classes forwhich it performs deserialization and thus allowing an attacker to executearbitrary code via crafted serialized data.

criterions.comment: jbossas4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
